name: MyLastWish
description:
Game made for ludum dare competin event in 48 hours.

-A-D TO MOVE

-Space TO JUMP

-E TO INTERACT WHIT OBJECTS

This is platform game with no combat!!!

YOUR MAIN GOAL: Get a reward

HOW TO PLAY:

Get to black idea bubbles to unlock wishes.

Then you can make a wish to get some abilities (only one wish can be wished)

Death reset your current wish, that you can choose another.

Long platforms have checkpoints, you can set it main by pressing E.

Each time you die, you are teleported to check point, jinn teleports with you.

There is two breakable platforms. To break them you need to wish STRENGTH and just jump on them.

MAIN STORY:

You made a plan to raiding one of the hardest (not hard at all ;)) dungeon. Plan was to take a Jinn (mystical creature you can wish almost everything you want) and make a wish to put you into a loop, that you could easy get info of dungeon structure. ANd break a loop with third wish. But you could’t make a wish, the way it actually break a loop. So you stucked in this dungeon forever. You could’t get with better idea, than forgeting each time you get a reward.

Tools:

Game in Unity3D

Art done in Photoshop

Audio generated in Leshy SF Designer
